meanings.definition: Land held in absolute ownership, free from any feudal obligations.
meanings.sent1: The farmer inherited the allodia from his grandparents.
meanings.sent2: The allodia was passed down through generations in the family.
meanings.sent3: The allodia seemed to have a magical aura around it.
meanings.sent4: Her allodia was a fortress of independence in a world of obligations.
meanings.sent5: The allodia gleamed under the sun, a symbol of freedom and ownership.
